name: Turret
description: Detect objects in range, rotating towards them and firing.

conditions.name: Has target
conditions.description: True if the turret currently has a target to aim at.

conditions.name: On shoot
conditions.description: Triggered when the turret can shoot at its target.

conditions.name: On target acquired
conditions.description: Triggered upon the turret finding a new target within range.

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: Test if the behavior is enabled.

actions.name: Acquire target
actions.description: Target a specific object if in range.

params.name: Target
params.description: Choose an object for the turret to specifically target if in range.

actions.name: Add object to target
actions.description: Add an object or family to target automatically.

params.name: Target
params.description: Choose an object or family for the turret to automatically detect as targets.

actions.name: Clear targets
actions.description: Remove all objects to target automatically.

actions.name: Unacquire target
actions.description: Unacquire current target so another target can be acquired.

params.name: State
params.description: Choose whether to enable or disable the behavior.

params.name: Range
params.description: The range to set, in pixels.

actions.name: Set rate of fire
actions.description: Set the turret rate of fire.

params.name: Rate of fire
params.description: The rate of fire to set, in seconds.

actions.name: Set rotate
actions.description: Enable or disable rotating to targets.

params.name: Rotate
params.description: Choose whether to automatically rotate towards targets.

params.name: Rotate speed
params.description: The rotation speed to set, in degrees per second.

actions.name: Set target mode
actions.description: Set how to deal with multiple targets.

params.name: Target
params.description: Choose how to deal with multiple targets.

actions.name: Set predictive aim
actions.description: Set whether to use predictive aim.

params.name: Predictive aim
params.description: Choose whether or not to use predictive aim.

actions.name: Set projectile speed
actions.description: Set the projectile speed for predictive aim to work.

params.name: Projectile speed
params.description: The projectile speed to set for predictive aim, in pixels per second.

expressions.name: TargetUID
expressions.description: Get the unique ID (UID) of the current target object.

expressions.name: Range
expressions.description: Get the current range in pixels.

expressions.name: RateOfFire
expressions.description: Get the current rate of fire in seconds.

expressions.name: RotateSpeed
expressions.description: Get the current rotate speed in degrees per second.
